storm-atro.name: Lightning Storm Atronach
storm-atro.description: First boss of AA. The main and the only mechanic is stacking on one of 4 runes when the storm is being casted

stone-atro.name: Foundation Stone Atronach
stone-atro.description: Second boss of AA. This boss casts The Quake and boulders. On boulders group should gain distance not to stack damage

varlariel.name: Varlariel
varlariel.description: Third boss of AA. This boss copy herself into 4 clones, each one must be killed - DPS check. If heals and DPS are good - can be ignored

mage.name: The Celestial Mage
mage.description: Last boss of AA. Summons Reflections which should be targeted, Axes which should be taunted. Also spawns Meteors and atronachs on HM. Execute phase is a DPS check
